item.title: Magicks
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

Add this after the spell you wantâ€¦

hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(18); castOnPlayer.entangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; stillgfx(363, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(363, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(562), 4); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(555), 4); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff; } }
